title: Create Indexes in Milvus
description: Creates indexes for specified collections in Milvus

id.title: Job ID
id.description: The ID for this job. Used in the API to reference this job. Allowed characters: a-z, A-Z, dash (-) and underscore (_)

sparkConfig.title: Additional parameters
sparkConfig.description: Provide additional key/value pairs to be injected into the training JSON map at runtime. Values will be inserted as-is, so use " to surround string values

writeOptions.title: Write Options
writeOptions.description: Options used when writing output to Solr or other sources

readOptions.title: Read Options
readOptions.description: Options used when reading input from Solr or other sources.

indexes-list.title: Indexes
indexes-list.description: List of the indexes that should be created with corresponding params.

milvusCollectionName.title: Collection Name
milvusCollectionName.description: Name of the collection in Milvus in which index should be created

indexType.title: Index Type
indexType.description: Index type which should be create for specified collection

indexParams.title: Index Parameters
indexParams.description: Parameters to be used to create index in Milvus. Specific to the chosen IndexType. For example, good starting values might be [M=36, efConstruction=500] for HNSW index and [nlist=4×sqrt(number of vectors)] for IVF indexes.

key.title: Milvus Index Param
key.description: The name of the Milvus index params like  M / efConstruction for HNSW or nlist for IVF indexes.

value.title: Value
value.description: Index param value. For example, good starting values might be [M=36, efConstruction=500] for HNSW index and [nlist=4×sqrt(number of vectors)] for IVF indexes.
